questions.describe:
Which privilege can be granted to members of a content library (workspace) without modifying user permissions?
*Choose 2 answers:*

answerOptions.describe: Create a new content library
Share content with other users in Chatter
Edit a member's library permissions
Add tags when editing content details

questions.describe:
A user responsible for managing and creating campaigns is unable to create a new campaign, even though the user's profile has the "Create: profile permission for Campaigns.
How should a system administrator grant the correct access to the user?

answerOptions.describe: Assign the user to the standard Marketing User profile
Select the Marketing User checkbox on the user record
Grant the user delegated administration rights to campaigns
Create a campaign sharing rule to grant access to the user

questions.describe:
What is a method for adding content to Salesforce CRM Content?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Attachments
Chatter files
Libraries
Documents

questions.describe:
Which dashboard component can display data from the summary rows of a report?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Table
Guage
Chart
Metric

questions.describe:
A user at Universal Containers reports an error message when attempting to log in. The administrator checks the user's login history, but there's no record of the attempted login.
What could be the cause of the issue?

answerOptions.describe: The user is attempting to log in with wrong password.
The user is attempting to log in outside of the profile login hours.
The user is attempting to log in outside of the profile IP login range.
The user is attempting to log in with the wrong username.

questions.describe:
Universal Containers currently assigns its users from the facilities and IT teams to the same profile. Universal Containers recently created a custom object to track company cars and wants only users from The facilities team to have access to this new object.
How can an administrator meet this requirement?

answerOptions.describe: Configure FLS on the new object for the facilities team
Assign the facilities team to a new role in the role hierarchy
Modify the standard profile currently shared by both teams
Create a custom profile for users on the facilities team

questions.describe:
Which statement is true regarding an approval process?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: an approval action defines the result of record approval or rejection
a delegated approver can reassign approval requests
the approval-history related list can be used to track the process
an assignment rule defines the approver for each process step

questions.describe: What must an administrator do when creating a record type?

answerOptions.describe: set the field level security for the record type
create a new page layout for the record type
assign the record type to the appropriate profiles
add the record type to the required user records

questions.describe: What type of field allows users to input text, images, and links?

answerOptions.describe: text area
input area
text area rich
text and image area

questions.describe:
What should a system administrator consider when setting up Mobile Lite?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: it must be enabled for the entire organization
it allows access to most custom objects in the organization
only recently-viewed records are synchronized
it allows access to all standard objects in the organization

questions.describe:
Universal Containers set the organisation-wide defaults for cases to private. When a case is escalated, case ownership changes to a Tier 2.
How can a system administrator give the sales operations team read/write access to all escalated cases?

answerOptions.describe: Create a case assignment rule
Create an ownership-based sharing rule
Create a criteria based sharing rule
Create a case escalation rule

questions.describe:
Universal Containers needs to synchronise data between Salesforce and external financial system.
How can a system administrator accomplish this?

answerOptions.describe: use an external ID field to match records between the systems
use the data loader to match records between the systems
use the data loader to upsert Salesforce records into the financial system
use the Excel connector to export records from both systems into Excel

questions.describe:
The cloud scheduler has which capability?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: the cloud scheduler allows users to view available meeting times on lead and contact calendars
Salesforce can automatically propose multiple meeting times based on Salesforce user calendars
the cloud scheduler can be enabled at the user profile level
a custom logo can be added to the meeting request email set to a contact or lead

questions.describe:
Which statement about Chatter posts and comments is true?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Updates to the Chatter feed on a record are only visible to users with access to the record.
Posts to a user's profile can be made private by clicking the lock icon.
Posts to a user's profile are hidden from anyone below that user in the role hierarchy.
Posts made to a user's profile are visible to all users in the organization.

questions.describe:
When can a validation rule be used to prevent invalid data?
*Choose 3 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: when records are deleted by a user
when records are imported
when records are edited by a user
when records are submitted using web-to-lead
when records are updated by a workflow rule

questions.describe: What is affected by changing the default locale setting for an organization?

answerOptions.describe: Time zone
Currency
Language
Date field

questions.describe:
Where can conditional highlighting be used?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: tabular reports
enhanced list views
matrix reports
summary reports

questions.describe: When converting a lead, how can an admin capture custom lead data on the converted contact?

answerOptions.describe: map custom lead field to the standard lead field
use the data loader to move the custom lead data
map custom lead field to custom contact fields
use the lead conversion wizard to select the fields

questions.describe:
The Support team at Universal Container wants to be more proactive about renewing support plans with customers. They would like the Support Rep dedicated to each account to be notified a month before the account's support plan expires.
What should an admin configure to meet this requirement?

answerOptions.describe: Escalation rule
Workflow rule
Auto-response rule
assignment rule

questions.describe:
What setting is controlled by a user's profile?
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Locale settings
Assigned apps
Record type assignment
Field-level security
Feature license assignment.

questions.describe: What relationship can be selected in a custom report type where Accounts is the primary object and Contacts is a related object?

Where can the multilingual solution search feature be enabled?
*Choose 2 answers*

Universal Containers uses a custom field on the account object to capture the account credit status. The sales team wants to display the account credit status on opportunities.
Which feature should a system admin use this meet this requirement?

What should a system administrator consider when deleting a custom field?
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Existing field values must be transferred to a new custom field.
Field values should be archived before a field is deleted.
Fields used in workflow and assignment rules cannot be deleted.
Deleted fields and values can be restored from the recycle bin within 15 hours.

questions.describe:
What setting can a system administrator enable in the Salesforce user interface?
*Choose 2 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Chatter messanger for specific users
Related list honer links.
Printable list views
Customisable receipt tags

questions.describe:
What can an administrator configure for users on the search result page?
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: columns displayed for each object
filter by which users can narrow down results
number of records displayed for each object
field being searched for on each object
objects included in the search

questions.describe: Universal Container is using a private sharing model. The U.S. sales director needs full access to all records owned by the U.S. sales representatives. How can this be accomplished?

answerOptions.describe: define a role hierarchy where the U.S sales director rolls up to the CEO
define a role hierarchy where the U.S. sales representatives roll up to the sales director
give the U.S. sales director read/write/edit/delete object permission on the profile
place the U.S. sales director in a queue with the U.S. sales representatives

questions.describe:
What is the capability of Service Cloud \ Customer portal?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: customers can log, view, edit, and close their own cases
the portal can be customized with corporate branding
customers can view and edit contacts related to their own accounts
the portal and its users can be created without additional licensing

questions.describe: What does a page layout allow an administrator to control?

answerOptions.describe: The business process and related piccoloist values displayed
The fields users see on detail and edit pages
The fields users see in reports and list views
The record types available to each role and profile.

questions.describe:
What standard object has a one-to-many relationship with the account object?
*Choose 3 answers*

answerOptions.describe: Lead
Contact
Opportunity
Case
Campaign

questions.describe:
Which level of access can be set when sharing a document folder with users?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: read/write/create/delete
read/write
read/write/create/read-only
read-only

questions.describe:
Universal Containers set the organization-wide default for opportunities to private.
Which record will an opportunity pipeline report return?

answerOptions.describe: opportunities for which the user running the report is also the account owner
opportunities for the entire sales organization regardless of the user running the report
opportunities owned by the user running the report and users below them in the role hierarchy
opportunities owned by the user running the report and users in the same role in the role hierarchy

questions.describe:
Which statement about sharing rules is true?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: sharing rules open up access of records
sharing rules are required in public read/write organizations
sharing rules grant delete access to records
sharing rules grant record access to roles and public groups

questions.describe: The admin at Universal Containers will create a custom field to track a specific Tier 2 support user on a case record. What data type should be used when creating this custom field?

answerOptions.describe: lookup filter
formula
hierarchical relationship
lookup relationship

questions.describe: Which feature allows a user to group campaigns within a specific marketing program or initiative?

answerOptions.describe: campaign hierarchy
campaign lists
campaign members
campaign influence

questions.describe:
What user interface setting should be enabled for users to edit records in a list view?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: inline editing
enhanced lists
enhanced profile list views
enhanced page layout editor

questions.describe: A marketing user has received a file of leads to import into Salesforce. What tool can be used to avoid duplicate lead records?

answerOptions.describe: Merge leads function
Validation rules
Data loader
Import wizard

questions.describe:
Which statement about Community experts is true?
*Choose 2 answers.*

answerOptions.describe: community experts can delete inappropriate community content
community experts are designated by an icon
community experts can manage Salesforce Ideas Categories
community experts can be designated for Salesforce Ideas or Answers
